name: Create Workspace Overlay
description: Full-page overlay guiding the user through creating a new workspace, including name, details, and initial setup steps.
location: Activated through the 'Create Workspace' button within the Workspace Navigation.
user_interactions: Wizard steps appear sequentially on submit.
New workspace data submitted on final step.

sub.name: Workspace Dropdown
sub.description: The entire dropdown component that appears when users click on the Workspace Dropdown Button, showing all available workspaces.
sub.location: Directly beneath the Workspace Dropdown Button.

sub.name: Dropdown Arrow Icon
sub.description: An icon indicating the presence of a dropdown menu, typically used to trigger the expansion of the Workspace Dropdown.
sub.location: Inside the Workspace Dropdown Button, aligned to the right.
user_interactions: Dropdown expands or collapses on click.

sub.name: Dropdown Workspace Toggle
sub.description: A toggle switch or button within the dropdown to easily switch between workspaces.
sub.location: Within the Workspace Dropdown, located at the top.

sub.name: Workspace Create Button
sub.description: A button that, when clicked, initiates the process to create a new workspace.
sub.location: Located at the bottom or within the Footer of the Workspace Dropdown.
user_interactions: Create Workspace Overlay appears on click.

sub.name: Dropdown Close Button
sub.description: Button or clickable area that allows users to close the dropdown manually.
sub.location: At the top right corner of the Workspace Dropdown.

sub.name: Workspace Details Display
sub.description: Shows additional details about the workspace such as the user's role or recent activity within the dropdown.
sub.location: Displayed adjacent to workspace names within the Workspace List in the dropdown.
user_interactions: Expandable or collapsible on click to show more/less details.

sub.name: Create Workspace Wizard
sub.description: The step-by-step interface that guides the user through the process of creating a new workspace.
sub.location: Overlay covers the main section of the screen when activated.
user_interactions: Next step appears on button click.
Workspace data submission on final submit.

sub.name: Dropdown Item Icon
sub.description: An icon associated with each item in the dropdown, usually providing a visual clue about the workspace or its status (e.g., active, inactive).
sub.location: Adjacent to each list item within the Workspace Dropdown.

sub.name: Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box
sub.description: Enables users to search for specific workspaces within the dropdown quickly.
sub.location: Located at the top of the Workspace Dropdown, facilitating easy access.
user_interactions: Filters dropdown list as user types.

sub.name: Workspace Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip that provides additional information or descriptions about the workspace when hovered over with the cursor.
sub.location: Appears near the Dropdown Item Icon or workspace name when hovered.

sub.name: Icon Tooltip
sub.description: A small popup providing additional context or details about the icon's function when hovered over.
sub.location: Displays next to or above the Dropdown Item Icon when mouse hover is detected.
user_interactions: Appears on hover over the icon.

sub.name: Search Bar Placeholder Text
sub.description: Provides a visual cue within the search bar to indicate it's for searching workspaces.
sub.location: Inside the search input area of the Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box.
user_interactions: Text disappears on focus or input.

sub.name: Tooltip Dismiss Overlay
sub.description: An overlay that facilitates closing the workspace tooltip when clicked outside the tooltip area.
sub.location: Covers the screen excluding the tooltip, active when a tooltip is displayed.
user_interactions: Does not interfere with other components when tooltip is absent.

sub.name: Divider Line Style
sub.description: Defines the visual attributes (color, thickness) of divider lines in dropdowns to enhance component separation.
sub.location: Applies to all visible divider lines within the Dropdown Divider component.

sub.name: Quick Action Confirmation Dialog
sub.description: A dialog box confirming the user's action when a quick action is initiated, preventing accidental modifications.
sub.location: Centered on screen, appearing over all other content when a quick action in the dropdown is clicked.
user_interactions: Confirms on approve, cancels on decline.

sub.name: Dropdown Search Icon
sub.description: An icon within the search bar that indicates the search function, usually represented as a magnifying glass.
sub.location: Inside the Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box, aligned to the left or right side.
user_interactions: No direct interaction, serves as a visual cue.

sub.name: Tooltip Close Button
sub.description: A button in the tooltip that allows users to manually close the tooltip.
sub.location: Inside the Workspace Tooltip or Icon Tooltip component.

sub.name: Divider Color Scheme
sub.description: Sets the color theme and styling of divider lines to match the application's visual identity.
sub.location: Applied to all divider lines within the Dropdown Divider component.

sub.name: Action Confirmation Button Set
sub.description: A set of buttons (e.g., confirm, cancel) within the Quick Action Confirmation Dialog, allowing users to complete or discard their action.
sub.location: Inside the Quick Action Confirmation Dialog component.

sub.name: Dropdown Item Background
sub.description: Visual background component for each dropdown item, providing hover and active state changes.
sub.location: Behind each Dropdown Workspace Toggle and Dropdown Item Icon components.

sub.name: Dropdown Divider
sub.description: A visual line or space that separates different sections of items within the dropdown for better organization.
sub.location: Divides sections within the Workspace Dropdown.

sub.name: Dropdown Quick Action Button
sub.description: Buttons that offer quick actions related to the workspace, such as pinning a workspace or accessing frequently used settings.
sub.location: Within each list item or as part of a header in the Workspace Dropdown.
user_interactions: Opens respective action or menu on click.

sub.name: Workspace Name Display
sub.description: Text showing the name of the current workspace to which the user is logged in, acting as a label for the Workspace Navigation component.
sub.location: Horizontally aligned within the Workspace Navigation, next to the current workspace banner.

sub.name: Settings Menu
sub.description: A menu appearing upon activating the Workspace Settings Icon, offering settings options such as notifications and integrations.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Workspace Settings Icon when clicked.

sub.name: Search Box Outline
sub.description: A visual border around the search bar to delineate the input field clearly and provide focus indication.
sub.location: Encapsulates the Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box component.

sub.name: Close Button Icon
sub.description: An illustrative icon inside the Tooltip Close Button to indicate its purpose clearly, typically represented by an 'X'.
sub.location: Centered within each Tooltip Close Button.

sub.name: Button Background Style
sub.description: Defines the visual style or theme (color, shadow) applied to buttons within Action Confirmation Button Set.
sub.location: Behind each button in the Action Confirmation Button Set.

sub.name: Hover Shade Overlay
sub.description: A subtle shade that appears over dropdown items to indicate an active hover state, enhancing interactivity feedback.
sub.location: Covers the Dropdown Item Background component during mouse hover.

sub.name: Placeholder Fade Animation
sub.description: An animation sequence for the disappearance of placeholder text, providing a smooth user experience.
sub.location: Within the Search Bar Placeholder Text component.

sub.name: New Workspace Notification
sub.description: Notification element indicating successful creation of a new workspace or any issues encountered.
sub.location: Heads-up notification area, typically at the top or bottom of the screen.
